titleStmt.title: The friendly interposer, between the authors of those papers, the one called a report, the other, a rebuke of that report in order to a sound reconciliation between the Presbyterians and Independents in doctrinals, by the proposal of a third way, when both of them in their own, are out / by John Humphrey.
titleStmt.author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
